input_text: Hi, I was charged twice for my last invoice and I need a refund for the extra charge.
context: Customer has a valid subscription and paid yesterday.

input_text: My internet has been very slow and keeps disconnecting since this morning. Please fix this as soon as possible.
I forgot my password and cannot log in to my account.
Can you explain how your family plan pricing works whenever you have time?
Please cancel my subscription at the end of this month.
context: Customer on monthly plan, renews on the 30th.

input_text: The app is not working at all and I need it for my work right now. This is urgent.
Just wanted to ask if you support dark mode on your mobile app.
My last three bills all have different amounts and I do not understand why.
context: Customer changed plan two months ago.

input_text: Please move my service to my new address next month.
context: Customer relocation scheduled for next month.

input_text: I keep getting an unknown error when I try to update my payment method.
